nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequest  FACET appName since 3 days ago
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequest  FACET appVersion  since 3 days ago
SELECT count(*)/uniqueCount(sessionId) from MobileRequest, MobileSession  since 1 day ago facet appName timeseries
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequest  FACET requestDomain since 3 days ago
SELECT percentile(responseTime, 98) as '(sec)', percentile(responseTime, 90) as '(sec)', percentile(responseTime, 50) as '(sec)' from MobileRequest since 3 days ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' OR errorType = 'HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled') as 'Error Rate %' FROM MobileRequestError, MobileRequest  since 3 days ago
SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequest  since 3 days ago facet carrier
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequest  facet weekdayOf(timestamp) since 3 days ago
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet requestPath since 3 days ago

SELECT percentile(responseTime, 90), latest(requestUrl) as 'Latest URL' from MobileRequest facet cases(where requestUrl like '%token%' as 'Tokens', where requestUrl like '%summary%' as 'Summary', where requestUrl like '%dashboards%' as 'Dashboards', where requestUrl like '%collections%' as 'Collections', where requestUrl like '%chartdata%' as 'Chartdata Service', where requestUrl like '%/v1/metrics%' as 'Metric Service', where requestUrl like '%accounts%' as 'Account Service', where requestUrl not like '%accounts%' and requestUrl not like '%/v1/metrics%' and requestUrl not like '%chartdata%'  and requestUrl not like '%token%' and requestUrl not like '%summary%' and requestUrl not like '%dashboards%' and requestUrl not like '%collections%' as 'Other' ) since 3 days ago
SELECT percentile(responseTime, 90) as 'Response Time (sec)' from MobileRequest  facet requestDomain since 3 days ago

widgets.title: % Users Impacted by >3 sec network response time

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequest.uuid), WHERE responseTime > 3) / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' FROM MobileRequest, Mobile   since 1 day ago timeseries compare with 2 days ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' OR errorType = 'HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled') as 'Error Rate %', filter(count(*), where networkError not like 'Cancelled') as '# of Requests', filter(count(*), where errorType='NetworkFailure' OR errorType='HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' as '# of Errors') FROM MobileRequestError, MobileRequest facet requestDomain  since 3 days ago where requestDomain not like 'wpad'

SELECT count(*), latest(requestUrl) as 'Latest URL' from MobileRequest facet cases(where requestUrl like '%token%' as 'Tokens', where requestUrl like '%summary%' as 'Summary', where requestUrl like '%dashboards%' as 'Dashboards', where requestUrl like '%collections%' as 'Collections', where requestUrl like '%chartdata%' as 'Chartdata Service', where requestUrl like '%/v1/metrics%' as 'Metric Service', where requestUrl like '%accounts%' as 'Account Service', where requestUrl not like '%accounts%' and requestUrl not like '%/v1/metrics%' and requestUrl not like '%chartdata%'  and requestUrl not like '%token%' and requestUrl not like '%summary%' and requestUrl not like '%dashboards%' and requestUrl not like '%collections%' as 'Other' ) since 3 days ago
SELECT percentile(responseTime, 90) as 'Response Time (specify unit)' from MobileRequest  facet requestDomain since 3 days ago timeseries
SELECT percentile(responseTime, 90) from MobileRequest  facet requestPath timeseries since 3 days ago
SELECT percentile(responseTime, 90) from MobileRequest  since 1 day ago compare with 2 days ago timeseries

SELECT percentage(count(*), where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' OR errorType = 'HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled') as 'Error Rate %', filter(count(*), where networkError not like 'Cancelled') as '# of Requests', filter(count(*), where errorType='NetworkFailure' OR errorType='HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' as '# of Errors') FROM MobileRequestError, MobileRequest facet requestPath   since 3 days ago where requestDomain not like 'wpad'
SELECT percentile(sessionDuration,90) as 'Session Duration (sec)' from MobileSession    since 3 days ago facet appName  timeseries

SELECT percentage(count(*), where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' OR errorType = 'HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' ) as 'Error Rate %', count(*) as '# of Requests', filter(count(*), where errorType='NetworkFailure' OR errorType='HTTPError' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' as '# of Errors') FROM MobileRequestError, MobileRequest facet requestUrl   since 3 days ago
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileSession   FACET appName since 3 days ago

widgets.title: HTTP Request List (filtered to app, version, etc.)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT requestMethod, requestUrl, statusCode, authentication_email as 'custom attribute with user id' from MobileRequest since 1 day ago

SELECT count(*), latest(accountName), latest(email) as 'custom attribute with user id', latest(device), latest(carrier), latest(asnOwner), latest(regionCode) FROM MobileRequest  FACET deviceUuid  limit 100 SINCE 1 days ago
SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequest  since 3 days ago facet requestUrl
SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequest  since 3 days ago facet requestDomain

widgets.title: Response Time Distribution by Country Code

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequest  since 3 days ago facet countryCode

widgets.title: Response Time Distribution by ASN Owner (wifi provider)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequest  since 3 days ago facet asnOwner
SELECT uniqueCount(sessionId) from MobileSession facet appVersion timeseries
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet appName
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet appVersion  limit 50
From MobileRequest  select uniqueCount(sessionId) facet connectionType
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet requestDomain
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet requestDomain timeseries
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet requestPath
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet requestPath timeseries

SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet city
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError FACET statusCode
SELECT (1-filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType='HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid)) * 100 AS '% Error-Free Users' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago
SELECT average(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet hourOf(timestamp) since 24 hours ago limit 24
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError FACET networkError

From MobileCrash Select uniqueCount(uuid) facet crashLocation SINCE  1 day ago

From MobileCrash Select uniqueCount(uuid) facet crashException SINCE  1 day ago
From MobileCrash Select average(sessionDuration) facet crashLocationClass SINCE  7 day ago
From MobileCrash Select uniqueCount(uuid) facet city SINCE  1 day ago

SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType='HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago

SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' FACET appVersion

SELECT uniqueCount(sessionId) from MobileSession facet appVersion timeseries

SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet carrier

SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'cancelled' facet appVersion
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet networkError where networkError not like 'Cancelled' timeseries
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet deviceManufacturer
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet requestPath  timeseries
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet networkError where networkError not like 'Cancelled'

SELECT percentage(count(osName), WHERE osName = 'iOS') FROM MobileSession SINCE 1 day ago
